"wow Angie you look awesome!"
"Yeah! When i was getting ready this morning it took me forever. i kept taking off articles of clothing and putting on more black ones!!"

"that's why i don't have a pet, i don't wanna touch anyone else's poop. i don't touch anyone's poop but my own! Just kidding poop rules!"

(ps- happy birthday baby!)

Dear room mates, 

Pay no attention to the empty tuna can in the recycling.


Love Sam



ps- kate we re-arranged the play room! it looks really good and i'm not just saying that because my L'Trimm portrait is in there. The rocking horses we found are the new tv chairs, last night jess and i danced in them to the Addams Family Values theme song that plays during the closing credits. Remember our Night Party? When you get back we're gonna have a Day Party, aka waking up at 6:am and partying till we drop. i nominate "funneling Sparks" as a Day Party activity.

We talked a good game about starting to play practical jokes on one another, then all became homos and never did anything with it. So to facilitate future practical joking, this is a list, to be continuously updated, of roommate tricks to play.


-one of us comes home late to find another roommate sleeping in her bed ( ---AND EATING HER PORRIDGE!!)
-wake the other roommates up at 3am and announce that it's time to start drinking, then actually all start drinking
-rubber chicken in the toaster oven
-hilarious trinkets in the Brita filter

yesterday i did the jane fonda total body workout video for the first time. it was on a vhs i found in the garbage that had the ends of a few regular routines and the entire advanced one. there was lots of hopping and dancing, everyone had really heavy makeup on, legwarmers, and luscious hair, and at one point (and by one i mean two points) this one lady started singing an inspirational workout song! i think you'd like that video a lot, kate. when you come back we can watch it together and piss off the people on the first floor.


ps- man our livejournal interests are so good!

Hello
  I wanted to get some feelers out to you all.  I'm looking to have 
someone design and tattoo for me.  I am asking you because you are a 
student at RISD and are 100% I'm sure better at these things then I!!!!  So, 
I would like to know if any of you would be interested in designing one 
for me, I know basically what I want....but have no idea how I want it 
be laid out so I'm looking for some ideas and someone to draw it out 
for me.  If you are interested please let me know!!

Thanks
Sheba

<3!

HOLY SHIT i definitely can't stop grinning and i also think i'm very close to tears right now because i just came across http://bestiz.net . uh huh. k-pop music video recordings & music videos. 1993 to current top 20s. and more! i could kiss someone right now. you want to go to the old stage section (these ones are very important): 28. seo taiji & boys '93 27. roo'ra '95 (the short girl was so influential to me) 25. h.o.t. '96 (kate you need to know about this) in k-pop m/v: 58. seo taiji (solo) *** so good! 84. kim jin pyo (but only because the guy looks and moves just like nate) 182. jo pd (so posi!) 262. seo taiji & boys ('93) (kate i think you'd like this.. it's kindof gay) 263. s.e.s.-dreams come true (from the dance mix) 292. r.ef (the main singer was once voted the best looking man in korea and i agree except he's doing something weird with his face here sometimes. lots of male ass in this one. this one is dancey) 354. sungjinwoo (lots of female ass in this one) 461. lee hyun do (and every other notablehip hop artist in korea on the streets) 305. drunken tiger (hip hop) you just got new summer plans and it's to learn k-pop dance moves!

I just wanna get married, really. Now I know that today there's a lot of people who'll tell you you're not supposed to want that, you're supposed to want something else, something bigger and better I guess, but more than anything that's all I want, I wanna start a family.  I know my own family still needs me around though, I live at home, and my paycheck-I wait tables and Murray's Diner, I make a dollar forty an hour plus tips-that's a big help, and of course you can never have enough people around to look after Ryan, he's my little brother, make sure he doesn't get hurt or nothing.  And I love 'em all to bits, Ryan, Mama, Dad, my sister Meg, but it's just that I've been living there so long now!  You know I'm twenty five years old, and that place is starting to feel like it's a little to small for me, like it's an old hand me down sweater I've grown out of.  Also, I know I'm not gonna be young forever, and at my age a girl wants a man!  Some days at the diner something handsome'll walk in that door and just for fun I think, maybe he's the one, Mr. Right.  Then I always try to grab that table right up and act real friendly.  Maybe I won't charge him for something, if he's that cute.  And yes now I know these days there's a lot of feminists around, up out of nowhere it feels like, and they'll tell you you're not supposed to care about getting married and things like that but really I think that's 'cause a lot of them are dykes, to be honest.  Not that I think there's anything wrong with dykes, mind you, I'm not sure if its natural but I actually know a bunch of them that are on my roller derby team.  We practice on Friday nights and most of the girls on the team are real nice, we always have a whole lot of fun, then afterwards we always go to the other diner, the one I don't work at, so that's a nice change.  My derby name's Rosie the Riveter.  Heck, I'm not even sure I know what a riveter is.  Sounds tough though, rite?

(god i'm filthy and smell so bad. sorry, girl next to me who keeps coughing. YEAH RIGHT SORRY YOU WERE BORN) I typed our address on google imagesearch and the cover of this movie called Sally of the Sawdust popped up. Plot Summary for Sally of the Sawdust (1925) Judge Foster throws his daughter out because she married a circus man. She leaves her baby girl with Prof. McGargle before she dies. Years later Sally is a dancer with whom Peyton, a son of Judge Foster's friend, falls in love. When Sally is arrested McGargle proves her real parentage. +getting thrown out +contravercial marriage +to a circus man +having a kid ++Professor McGargle +dying +dancing +getting arrested YOU DO THE MATH. i did ps, i asked PJ if he wants to live with us and he totally seemed interested and wants to get out of that weak enforced housing crap anyway. know how all our innitials make lots of stuff. if PJ lived with us we'd be PSK, like that rad song by Schoolly D. "rock music is a thing in the past, so all you long haired faggots can kiss my ass" Got at the bar, copped some flack Copped some cheeba-cheeba, it wasn't wack Got to the place, and who did I see A sucker-ass nigga tryin to sound like me Put my pistol up against his head I said, "Sucker-ass nigga, I should shoot you dead" A thought ran across my educated mind Said, man, Schoolly D ain't doin no time Grabbed the microphone and I started to talk Sucker-ass nigga, man, he started to walk rhyme, not time. that's so posi!
